data.title: The Licensing of Commercial Cannabis in Mendocino County Project Environmental Impact Report
data.excerpt: The Department of Cannabis Control (DCC) intends to prepare an Environmental Impact Report (EIR) for the Licensing of Commercial Cannabis Cultivation in Mendocino County Project (Project).
